name: Tankgrounds GL
description:
Tankgrounds is an early stage development project made by us-Icebound Development-as our first game project.  The game is currently still in development and there may be bugs and or difficulties.  Tankgrounds is a top-down 2D "shooter" where you control a tank and destroy waves of enemy tanks and occasional bosses.  How far can you get?

Note - This is the WebGL Version meaning more bugs could be apparent.  Features such as multiplayer may never be added to this version due to restrictions.  Browser only (Reccomended for Chromebooks)

Any donations are appreciated and will be used for future multiplayer features!

Current Features:

  • Over 20 waves of enemies, each getting harder as you go
  • Two different maps with two different gamemodes
  • A fully working health and damage system for the player
  • Pathfinding for the enemy tanks
  • Hand drawn pixel art
  • Music
  • 2 unique bosses

Update V 1.5.0.0:

  • Art and Map revamp
  • New Desert Map
  • Defend the Base Gamemode
  • Pausing (Still a little buggy, press Escape to pause and Enter to unpause)

Planned Features:

  • More Visual effects
  • More Sound effects
  • More Maps/Gamemodes
  • CO-OP
  • PvP Multiplayer
  • Scene transitions
  • More Tank types and waves
  • Tank powerups
